name: Pac-snake-like the Game
description:
Made in 100 minutes for 10^2 jam.

Space or left click to shoot. Use mouse to move. R to restart.

A big bug slipped through but oh well!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! (it happens because I forgot to re-set the trail variable for all ghosts when one disappears by getting eaten)
its been fun and I hope you've had fun in this jam too

update: I added a postjam version without the bug above, but you should rate the game for the first version (10squaresjam.zip).
